text: “firavungē janatāvagē tatvayada, ovunṭa pera visūvangē tatvaya menma (movungē) tatvayada ættēya. ovunda (movun menma) tamangē deviyangē sādhakayan boru karamin siṭiyaha. ebævin ovungē pāpayanhi hētuven api (vividha vargayē dan̆ḍuvam magin firavunṭa pera visū) ovunva vināśa kara dæmū atara, firavungē janatāvada gilvā dæmuvemu. movun siyalla aparādhakaruvan vaśayenma siṭiyaha
